19 bool DataPreprocessor::filterValidDomains(const std::string &input_filename, const std::string &output_filename) {
20 
21  int csv_columns[2] = {0, 1};
22  bool success = this->ptr_csv->csv2map(input_filename, csv_columns[0],csv_columns[1]);
23  Csv::map::iterator map_it;
24  bool is_downloadable = true;
25  int good_links = 0, all_links = 0; //counter of usable links
26  std::ofstream valid_domains_file;
27  valid_domains_file.open(output_filename);
28  if (!valid_domains_file.is_open()) //invalid file
29  {
30  return false;
31  } else {
32  for (map_it = ptr_csv->getId_url_map()->begin(); map_it != ptr_csv->getId_url_map()->end(); ++map_it) {
33  std::cout << map_it->first << " " << map_it->second << std::endl << std::flush;
34  all_links++;
35  std::string a;
36  is_downloadable = this->ptr_http->download(map_it->second, a);
37 
38  if (is_downloadable) {
39  valid_domains_file << map_it->first << ";" << map_it->second << "\n";
40  ++good_links;
41  }
42  }
43  valid_domains_file.close();
44  double prc = good_links / (double) all_links;
45  prc = prc * 100;
46 
47  std::cout << "All links: " << all_links << "\nGood links: " << good_links << "\nPercentage: " << prc << "%"
48  << std::endl << std::flush;
49  }
50  return success;
51 }

59 bool DataPreprocessor::parseHtmls(const std::string &filename,
60  const std::string &from_which_tags) {
61  //get html addresses from textfile to vector of string
62  string_vec addresses = ptr_http->getLinesFromFile(filename + ".txt");
63  std::string html_text, file_path;
64  std::string path_root(this->_curl_output_folder + "/");
65 
66  bool success = false;
67  boost::filesystem::create_directories(this->_curl_output_folder); //create a directory for results
68  int count = 0;
69  for (std::string i : addresses) {
70  html_text = "";
71  success = ptr_http->download(i, html_text); //for every link from file download the html code
72  if (!success) {
73  break;
74  }
75  file_path = path_root + "tmp.txt";
76  ptr_http->writeStrToFile(file_path, html_text);
77  std::string line, line1;
78  std::ifstream ifs(file_path);
79  html_text = "";
80  file_path = path_root + std::to_string(this->fileCounter) + ".txt";
81  while (!ifs.eof()) {
82  getline(ifs, line);
83 
84  while (line.back() != '>') {
85  if (!ifs.eof()) {
86  getline(ifs, line1);
87  line += line1;
88  } else {
89  break;//TODO cos tu sie zapetla, trzeba naprawic
90  }
91  }
92  html_text += line;
93  html_text += '\n';
94  }
95 
96  std::string output_of_parsing(filename + "\n");
97  output_of_parsing.erase(0,11); //erase train_data
98  std::set<std::string> map_of_attribs;
99  ptr_http->parseHtmlAndSave(html_text, from_which_tags,
100  output_of_parsing,
101  map_of_attribs); //parse html_text and save to file in /output directory text from "html/body" node, that means only the text between <body></body>
102  all_atribs.insert(map_of_attribs.begin(), map_of_attribs.end());
103  ptr_http->writeStrToFile(file_path, output_of_parsing); //write to file parsed html
104 
105  this->fileCounter++;
106  count++;
107  if(count>20){
108  break;
109  }
110  }
111  std::cout << "All attributes" << all_atribs.size() << std::endl;
112  return success;
113 }

132 void DataPreprocessor::chooseTrainData(const std::string &inFilename) {
133 
134  std::ifstream file(inFilename + ".txt");
135  int lineCount = 0;
136  std::string line, category(inFilename);
137 
138  boost::filesystem::create_directories("train_data");
139  boost::filesystem::create_directories("test_data");
140 
141 
142  std::string to_remove = "categories/";
143  std::string::size_type i = category.find(to_remove); //don't want direcotry name as a category name
144 
145  if (i != std::string::npos)
146  category.erase(i, to_remove.length());
147 
148 
149  std::string trainFilename("train_data/"+category + ".txt");
150  std::string testFilename("test_data/" +category + ".txt");
151  std::string train, test;
152  while (getline(file, line)) {
153  if (lineCount % 4) {
154  train += line;
155  train += "\n";
156  } else {
157  test += line;
158  test += "\n";
159  }
160  lineCount++;
161  }
162 
163  ptr_http->writeStrToFile(trainFilename, train);
164  ptr_http->writeStrToFile(testFilename, test);
165 }

182 bool DataPreprocessor::get_attribs_from_link(const std::string &url) {
183  std::string html_text, file_path;
184  std::string path_root("example/");
185  std::string from_which_tags("/html/body/div[@id='content']/div[@id='bodyContent']/div[@id='mw-content-text']/p");
186  bool success = false;
187  boost::filesystem::create_directories("example"); //create a directory for results
188  html_text = "";
189  success = ptr_http->download(url, html_text); //for every link from file download the html code
190  if (!success) {
191  return false;
192  }
193  file_path = path_root + "tmp.txt";
194  ptr_http->writeStrToFile(file_path, html_text);
195  std::string line, line1;
196  std::ifstream ifs(file_path);
197  html_text = "";
198  file_path = path_root + "attribs.txt";
199  while (!ifs.eof()) { //prepare code for parsing
200  getline(ifs, line);
201 
202  while (line.back() != '>') {
203  if (!ifs.eof()) {
204  getline(ifs, line1);
205  line += line1;
206  } else {
207  break;
208  }
209  }
210  html_text += line;
211  html_text += '\n';
212  }
213 
214  std::string output_of_parsing;
215  std::set<std::string> map_of_attribs;
216  ptr_http->parseHtmlAndSave(html_text, from_which_tags,
217  output_of_parsing,
218  map_of_attribs); //parse html_text and save to file in /output directory text from "html/body" node, that means only the text between <body></body>
219  ptr_http->writeStrToFile(file_path, output_of_parsing); //write to file parsed html
220  return success;
221 }
